DOC.brief_summary: Aim of the study is a description of changes in platelet function during continuous veno-venous hemodialysis or hemofiltration in patients on an intensive care unit using the Multiplate system.
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring Platelet Function During Continuous Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Need for a continuous renal replacement therapy Platelet Count >100.000/nl Pregnancy Age <18 years Renal replacement therapy within the 7 days prior to enrollment
